summary: A sexually "undeclared" college freshman's clairvoyant/prophetic dreams are the first sign that something very strange is going on involving his class-mates -- with him at the center.
cast: Thomas Dekker|Haley Bennett|Chris Zylka|Roxane Mesquida|Juno Temple|Andy Fischer-Price|Nicole LaLiberte|Jason Olive|James Duval|Brennan Mejia|Kelly Lynch|Carlo Mendez|Christine Nguyen|Michael James Spall|Sean Bresnahan|Brandy Futch|Natalie Alyn Lind|Jen Mears
title: Kaboom
